resources.string: Activate to get direction notifications while google maps navigation is running on your ticwatch.

Go to Settings -> Accessibility and activate the Direction Notifier Service to get direction notifications on your ticwatch while google maps navigation is running.

 

 PLEASE NOTE: 

 The google maps notification is not fully synchronized on time with notifications for your ticwatch. The reason for that is to reduce traffic between phone and ticwatch. The functionaltiy of the service can be affected by a newer version of google maps.



 Developer: deLUXe
